label: 155. Ledger for Vernizobre Bank Construction ca. 1860
description: Ledger for Vernizobre Bank construction (bank termed as a repair to a river) ca. 1860, including entries dated 1859.  Ledger itemizes expenses associated with the building of Vernizobre bank and includes payments to various landowners for use of their slave hands and carts.  4p.

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: Ledger for Vernizobre Bank construction (bank termed as a repair to a river) ca. 1860, including entries dated 1859.  Ledger itemizes expenses associated with the building of Vernizobre bank and includes payments to various landowners for use of their slave hands and carts.  4p.
